title: From PopMart to JD.com: Britain and China rush to forge business deals as diplomatic thaw takes hold
summary_full: Chinese firms moved to pledge hundreds of millions of investment in the U.K. as Starmer's visit to China spurred a flurry of business deals and money flows.
